[DQC.US.0087.9370] The element OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent with a value of 133,000 has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case either: 1. The element OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrentStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the Operating Lease liability Current is included; or 2. The Balance Sheet location axis should be used with two or more account members to identify into which financial statement captions the Operating Lease liability Current has been apportioned.
Period :2023-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9370 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1326205/000118518523000693/igcpharma20230331_10k.htm 9942

[DQC.US.0087.9370] The element OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent with a value of 123,000 has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case either: 1. The element OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrentStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the Operating Lease liability Current is included; or 2. The Balance Sheet location axis should be used with two or more account members to identify into which financial statement captions the Operating Lease liability Current has been apportioned.
Period :2022-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9370 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1326205/000118518523000693/igcpharma20230331_10k.htm 9946
